titles.title: MilTax Awareness Act of 2023
MilTax Awareness Act of 2023
To raise awareness of the MilTax program and other tax preparation services provided by the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
MilTax Awareness Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to ensure that each member of an Armed Force receives an annual written notice about the availability of the MilTax program and other tax preparation assistance programs furnished by DOD.
